title: Hawaiian hospitality
creator_credit: Pan American World Airways and Matson Hotels
brief_description: Describes the facilities provided by the Matson hotels in Hawaii for the comfort and pleasure of holiday makers. All the thrills of surf-riding and surf skiing are portrayed. Glimpses of the informal buffet dinners provided by the Royal Hawaiian Hotel; islanders performing native dances before the guests and a mannequin parade on the terrace. Follows the tourists as they visit neighbouring islands.
